hero.headline: Hanga udushya kandi wunguke hamwe na
hero.description: Muri Exceledge, dutanga ibisubizo by’ubucuruzi n’imari byihuse kandi by’umwuga kugira ngo dufashe urwego rwawe gukura. Uhereye ku kwishyura byihuse kugeza ku nama z’inzobere, dufasha ba rwiyemezamirimo bato n’abacuruzi bakomeye. Tujyane, utere imbere mu buryo bugezweho bwo gukora ubucuruzi.

whyChooseUs.title: Impamvu zatuma uhitamo twe
whyChooseUs.description: Twiyemeje gufasha ubucuruzi bwawe kugera ku ntsinzi mu Rwanda

compliance.title: Impuguke mu bijyanye no kubahiriza amategeko
compliance.desc: Twemeza ko ubucuruzi bwawe bukurikiza amategeko yose y’imisoro n'andi mategeko.

team.title: Itsinda ry’inzobere
team.desc: Dufite ubunararibonye bw’imyaka mu gutanga serivisi z’imisoro n’ubucuruzi ku bigo byose.

innovation.title: Ibisubizo by’iterambere
innovation.desc: Duhuza ubunararibonye bwa gakondo n’ikoranabuhanga rigezweho kugira ngo tugere ku musaruro uruseho.

jean.quote: Serivisi zabo zo gucunga TIN ziratugirira akamaro cyane kandi ziturinda ibihano. Turabashimira cyane.
jean.name: Jean Mutesi

robert.quote: Kugerageza ubucuruzi bwacu kuri Google Maps byaduhesheje kumenyekana cyane. Bakoze akazi koroheje kandi neza.
robert.name: Robert Mugisha

claire.quote: Serivisi zabo z’ibaruramari n’imisoro ni ingenzi cyane ku rugendo rw’iterambere ry’ikigo cyacu. Ubumenyi bwabo bwadufashije kunyura mu mategeko agoye y’imisoro.
claire.name: Claire Uwimana

cta.title: Witeguye Gutangira?
cta.desc: Twandikire uyu munsi tuganire uko twagufasha guteza imbere ubucuruzi bwawe mu Rwanda.

tin.name: Gucunga TIN
tin.description: Dutanga serivisi zo gucunga TIN buri kwezi, hakurikijwe ingano y'ubucuruzi bwawe. Igiciro gihinduka bitewe n'inyungu ubucuruzi bukora—bizafasha ibigo bito kubona serivisi ku giciro gito, naho ibigo binini bikishyura mu buryo buboneye, buri mukiriya agahabwa ubufasha bukwiye ku giciro gikwiriye ubushobozi bwe

google.name: Kwandikwa kuri Google Map
google.description: Andikisha ubucuruzi bwawe kuri Google Maps hamwe no kwemezwa, guhuza amakuru nyayo, no gushyiraho amafoto 5. Twizeza ko izina ryawe rizagaragara, tukazamura uko ugaragara aho ukorera, ndetse tukaguha ubufasha mu minsi 30. Fata iyi gahunda hakiri kare!

library.name: Isomero n' Ibitabo
library.description: Bona uburyo budafite imbibi bwo gukoresha inyandiko z’inzobere, amajwi, amashusho, n'ibyo wiyunganyijeho. Uburenganzira buhoraho, binyuze kuri telefoni igihe cyose, hamwe n'ibikoresho bidasanzwe by'abanyamuryango.

accounting.name: Serivisi z'Imari na Imisoro
accounting.description: Serivisi z'imari n'ubushobozi mu bijyanye n'imisoro.
accounting.compliance: Inkunga yo Gukurikiza Ibyo RRA, RSSB, RDB, RPPA bisaba

advisory.name: Inama & Amahugurwa
advisory.description: Inama za kinyamwuga no guteza imbere ubumenyi.
advisory.training: Amahugurwa ya Excel, EBM, Porogaramu z'Imari

documents.name: Ubufasha mu Gushyira mu bikorwa Impapuro n'Ibyemezo
documents.description: Ubufasha mu kubona impapuro n'ibyemezo by'ingenzi by'ubucuruzi.
documents.certificates: TCC, Icyemezo cya RSSB, Icyemezo cy'Ubuzima bwiza
documents.ebm: Icyemezo cya EBM, Icyemezo cya VAT

financial.name: Inkunga y'Imari n'Iterambere ry'Ubucuruzi
financial.social: Imiyoboro ya Sosiyete n'Ubushobozi bwo Kuyamamaza

services.transparentPricing: Ibiciro byumvikana ku serivisi z'ingenzi z'ubucuruzi n'ibisubizo byihariye bihuye n'ibikenewe by'ubucuruzi bwawe

about.aboutUsDescription: Dutanga ibisubizo byimbitse by’imari n’ikoranabuhanga bigenewe ubucuruzi bwo mu Rwanda, tukagufasha kubahiriza imisoro, kwiyandikisha kuri murandasi, no kubona ibikoresho by’ingirakamaro.
about.tinDescription: Igiciro cyacu cyateguwe mu byiciro cyubahiriza ibigo by’ubucuruzi byose, kuva ku bitangira kugera ku binini, kugirango bigume mu murongo w’amategeko y’imisoro mu rugendo rwose rw’ubucuruzi.
about.monthlyMaintenance: Kubungabunga buri kwezi hashingiwe ku musaruro
about.pricingTiers: Ibiciro bitanu kuva ku 10,000 kugeza ku 500,000 RWF/buri kwezi
about.digitalDescription: Iyandikishe kandi wiyubakire izina kuri murandasi ukoresheje serivisi zacu zo gutangiza rimwe ndetse n'ibikoresho bihoraho by'ikoranabuhanga.
about.libraryAccess: Kwinjira muri Digital Library (3,600 RWF/buri kwezi)
about.approachDescription: Duhuza ubunararibonye bw’iwacu n’ibisubizo bijyanye n’igihe kugira ngo dutange serivisi zinoze mu miterere y’ubucuruzi bw’u Rwanda.
about.transparentPricing: Ibiciro bigaragara kandi biteguye mu byiciro
about.cta: Hitamo mu biciro byacu bigaragara kandi wiyandikishe mu minota mike. Turahari kugira ngo tugufashe mu rugendo rwo gukura k’ubucuruzi bwawe.

faqs.question: Ni izihe nzira zo kwishyura wemera?
faqs.answer: Twemera amafaranga ya mobile (MTN, Airtel), transfers za banki, hamwe na carte za kredit/debit (Visa, Mastercard). Ibikorwa byose byo kwishyura bikorwa mu buryo bwizewe binyuze mu nzira yacu yo kwishyura.

faqs.question: Nabasha gute kwiyandikisha mu mirimo ya TIN Management?
faqs.answer: Hitamo gusa igiciro cy'ubucuruzi bwawe mu byiciro byacu by'ibiciro, hanyuma tuzaguha amabwiriza yihuse yo kwinjira. Uzakenera gutanga amakuru y'ibanze ku bucuruzi bwawe n'amakuru y'ubwishyu.

faqs.question: Mbona kubohora umwandiko wanjye wa Digital Library igihe icyo aricyo cyose?
faqs.answer: Yego, ushobora kubohora ubusabe bwawe igihe icyo aricyo cyose binyuze muri dashboard yawe. Uzabona gukomeza kugera ku bikorwa kugeza igihe cyose waba wiyandikishije.

faqs.question: Bimara igihe kingana iki gukoresha Google Location?
faqs.answer: Bikunze gufata iminsi 2-3 nyuma yo kubona kwemeza kwishyura. Tuzitwara ku bikorwa byose byo kwemeza hamwe na Google kandi tukakumenyesha igihe ubucuruzi bwawe buzaba bukoreshwa kuri Maps.

faqs.question: Serivisi za accounting zanyu ziraboneka ku bucuruzi mpuzamahanga?
faqs.answer: Ubu, tuzwi cyane mu gutegura ibikorwa by'imisoro n'imari by'u Rwanda. Ku bucuruzi mpuzamahanga, turagusaba kutwandikira kugira ngo tuganire ku buryo bwo gutanga serivisi.

faqs.question: Serivisi zanyu zo gutanga inama ku misoro zirimo iki?
faqs.answer: Abajyanama bacu batanga inama ku kunoza imisoro, kubahiriza amategeko ya RRA, gucunga VAT, no gutegura igenzura. Iyi serivisi ni iyo kugendana n'ibikenewe by'umwihariko ku bucuruzi bwawe.

faqs.question: Nshobora kubona ubufasha ku bijyanye no kubahiriza RSSB?
faqs.answer: Yego, turafasha mu kwandikisha RSSB, gutanga ibitekerezo by’ukwezi, kwiyandikisha abakozi, no kubona ibyangombwa nk'ibice by'ubufasha bwacu bwo kubahiriza amategeko.

faqs.question: Bimara igihe kingana iki kugirango mfashe mu gusaba inguzanyo?
faqs.answer: Igihe cyacu gisanzwe cyo gutunganya ibyangombwa ni iminsi 5-7 nyuma yo kwakira inyandiko zisabwa zose. Dukorana n'inzego nyinshi za banki kugirango tubone amabwiriza meza.

faqs.question: Ni iki gituma porogaramu zanyu z'amahugurwa zitandukanye?
faqs.answer: Duharanira ibibazo by'ukuri by'ubucuruzi mu Rwanda no gutanga ubufasha nyuma y'amahugurwa. Abatoza bacu bose ni abanyamwuga bafite uburambe mu kazi.

faqs.question: Ibiciro byanyu birashobora kuganirwaho ku masezerano yo mu gihe kirekire?
faqs.answer: Yego, dutanga ibiciro by'igabanyirizo ku kwiyandikisha k'umwaka muri serivisi za TIN Management n'ibijyanye n'imari. Hamagara itsinda ryacu ry'ubucuruzi kugirango tubonere ibisubizo byihariye.

faqs.question: Ni ibihe byangombwa bikenewe mu kwiyandikisha VAT?
faqs.answer: By'umwihariko: Icyemezo cya TIN, inyandiko z'ubucuruzi, amakuru ya banki, n'amasezerano y'ubukode bw'ahantu. Tuzatanga urutonde rwose rw’ibikenewe mu gihe cy'ibanze.

faqs.question: Murafasha kubikuza amafaranga y'umusoro kuva kuri RRA?
faqs.answer: Yego, tuzwi cyane mu gukurikirana amafaranga y'umusoro, harimo gutegura inyandiko, kuzishyikiriza, no gukurikirana iterambere ry'ibikorwa na RRA.

fqa.title: Ibibazo Bikunze Kubazwa
fqa.subtitle: Ibikenewe byose biri hano, byateguwe neza kandi byoroshye kubibona.

google-location.description: Serivisi imwe yo gushyira ubucuruzi bwawe kuri Google Maps

digital-library.description: Ubunyamuryango buri kwezi ku isomero ryacu ryo kuri murandasi

payment.thank_you: Urakoze kwishyura. Uzakira ubutumwa bwo kwemeza kuri telefoni yawe vuba.
payment.title: Kwishyura Birakenewe*
payment.description: Murasabwa kwishyura kugira ngo ubashe gukoresha iri serivisi.

paymentFailed.title: Kwishyura Byanze
paymentFailed.thankYou: Ntitwashoboye gutunganya ubwishyu bwawe. Nyamuneka reba amafaranga yawe kuri mobile money hanyuma wongere ugerageze. Niba ikibazo gikomeza, hamagara serivisi yacu y'ubufasha.

servicesPricing.title: Serivisi Zacu & Igiciro
servicesPricing.description: Igiciro cyumvikanyweho ku gaciro kadasanzwe - menya neza gahunda ikubereye

paymentsCompletion.enterPhoneNumber: Injiza nimero ya telefone yawe ya {provider}:
paymentsCompletion.paymentRequest: Uzabona ubusabe bwo kwishyura kuri iri nimero

processPayment.checkPhone: Reba kuri telefone yawe kugirango ubone ubutumwa bw'ubusabe bwo kwishyura
processPayment.paymentInstructionAirtel: Cira amabwiriza ya Airtel Money kugirango ushyure

user_register.add_phone_description: Nyamuneka tanga numero ya telefone yawe kugirango uzamure profile yawe unafashe serivisi zose.

errors.google_error: Ikosa ryabaye mu kwinjira na Google. Gerageza kongera.

announcement.bookmarkReminder: Bika uru rupapuro muri favorit kugira ngo utazacikwa n'itangazo cyangwa itanga ryo mu gihe gito.

announcement.message: Murakoze gusura page yacu y'amatangazo. Ubu nta matangazo araboneka. Turabashishikariza kongera kudusura vuba!

tin_management.welcome: Murakaza neza kuri Exceledge, ibere umunyamuryango maze ugire inyungu zikurikira:

books.title: Ibitabo n’Isomero
books.description: Sura urutonde rw’ibitabo byacu biri mu buryo butandukanye

toast.contactFormSubmit: Murakoze ku butumwa mwatwoherereje! Tuzabagezaho igisubizo vuba.
toast.submitErrorMessage: Habayeho ikosa mu kohereza ubutumwa bwanyu. Mwongere mugerageze nyuma.

auth.requiredDescription: Ugomba kuba winjiye (wiyandikishije) kugira ngo ubone serivisi.

common.network_error: Habaye ikosa kuri network, subira ugerageze
